wikipedia_page.main: Jayne Pierson is a Welsh fashion designer. She launched her début collection with On|Off at London Fashion Week in September 2009. She has interned and designed for Alexander McQueen and Vivienne Westwood. Her speciality is designing fashions for artists and actors.

response: In 2012 the Welsh fashion designer Jayne Pierson created a line of bespoke women's wear for Melin Tregwynt.
